testimonials.title: Student Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what my students think of their learning experience with Solution FLE.

items.name: Maria Garcia
items.text: Aline is an exceptional teacher! Her lessons are structured, dynamic and tailored to my pace. In 6 months, I progressed much more than I ever imagined. I highly recommend Solution FLE!

items.name: Yuki Tanaka
items.text: The cultural immersion workshops are fantastic! I not only improved my French, but also discovered French culture in an authentic way. Thank you Aline!

items.name: Hans Mueller
items.text: Professional, patient and very committed. Aline helped me prepare my DELF exam with confidence. Her teaching approach is truly effective.

items.name: Sophie Chen
items.text: I was afraid to learn French, but Aline made it fun and accessible. She explains clearly and is very encouraging. I am very satisfied!

items.name: Carlos Silva
items.text: The private lessons are truly personalized. Aline listens to my needs and adjusts her teaching accordingly. Excellent value for money!
